sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) The character may take the Makashi Finish action, making a Lightsaber (Presence) combat check against an engaged target, adding force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points to add + 10 to any Critical Injury roll resulting from the check.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <name>Makashi finish</name> <number>TAL0001076</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 03:53:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f0506078db224c542901de90cf96199b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 03:53:22</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
